ai-tika-s0105t11:84_0: adorned with jewellery, beautiful, and ugly;
ai-tika-s0105t11:85_0: When I’ve drunk the horn of this, it’s my merit.
ai-tika-s0105t11:86_0: Then you also bring up the merit,
ai-tika-s0105t11:88_0: Let the king look after this principled king.
ai-tika-s0105t11:89_0: lovers of good deeds, sunn hemp, and making offerings.
ai-tika-s0105t11:91_0: always quenched out of good intentions,
ai-tika-s0105t11:94_0: The Dangers of the Mind is finished.
